title: 30 Minute Almond Chicken by Minute® Rice

instructions.1: Toss chicken with dressing in sealable plastic bag. Add chicken with dressing to large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat; cook 4 minutes on each side or until browned.
instructions.2: Stir in broth; bring to boil. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add beans; cook 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through (170 degrees F).
instructions.3: Remove chicken from skillet. Add rice and almonds. Remove from heat; cover. Let stand 5 minutes. Serve chicken over rice mixture.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the chicken from Step 1 being used?
Is chicken from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is dressing from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to cook the chicken in Step 2?
Can we toss (Step 1) and remove (Step 3) at the same time?
